About LeeL Blog
About LeeL Blog

Welcome to LeeL Blog LeeL Blog allows you blog for free using Evernote ( www.evernote.com ) as your post editor and Github ( www.github.com ) as your website host. Using our blog template, you can create your new blog in seconds, without any programing knowledge nor hassle. You can choose to post in standard HTML or the well known Markdown syntax of formating. If you are a designer or a programmer and would like fully customize your blog appearance, you can use the power of Github to track your modifications and work together with your team.
